mdRecord.dcterms:title: Crown Prince Leopold Signs Guest Book, October 29, 1919
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: National Pictorial News
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: LeÃÅopold III, King of the Belgians, 1901-1983
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Crown Prince Leopold signing the guest book in the upper garden. Mount Vernon Resident Superintendent Harrison H. Dodge is seen at left. The photographer's stamp appears on the reverse. A handwritten caption (by Harrison Dodge) reads: 'Crown Prince Leopold registering in Supt's notable book of signatures.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Upper Garden
